title: Mother of War LF Top
body:
Looking for a confident Top laner main to finish off our team for next season. We consist of Silver-Gold and are 18+. Send me a friend request in game if interested.

JG: [KupoKun](http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=KUPO+KUN)
MID: [Steemo](http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=steemo)
ADC: [Badasaurus Rex](http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=badasAURUS+REX)
SUPP: [Lockdown Loaded](http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Lockdown%20Loaded)

IGN: Lockdown Loaded

replies.body: Top main, added you in game

If you find a top laner, let me know, I have a team that would be willing to have a scrim against yours if you're up for it? 

If you remember me, we used to duo
